text: Henley is an unincorporated community in Klamath County, Oregon, United States. It is about southeast of Klamath Falls along Oregon Route 39. The community is named after James T. Henley, who settled here in 1887 and operated a large ranch. He died in 1901. Henley High School, Henley Middle School, and Henley Elementary are in Henley. All are part of the Klamath County School District. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Klamath County, Oregon Category:Unincorporated communities in Oregon
title: Henley, Oregon
